author: Notimerica
title: El ministro de Defensa de Reino Unido, desde Kiev: "Garanticemos que la libertad triunfa sobre la tiranía"
text: MADRID, 8 Mar. (EUROPA PRESS) - El ministro de Defensa de Reino Unido, Grant Shapps, ha alertado desde Kiev que es importante "hacer sonar las alarmas" sobre la situación actual en el frente de guerra en Ucrania y ha instado a la comunidad internacional a "garantizar que la libertad triunfa sobre la tiranía". En un vídeo difundido a través de sus redes sociales, Shapps ha señalado que es necesario "asegurarse de que Ucrania gana esta guerra". "Estoy en Kiev para hacer un llamamiento al mundo democrático", ha dicho antes de matizar que Reino Unido ha realizado su mayor contribución militar hasta la fecha. "Todas las naciones deben ahora hacer lo mismo para asegurarse de que la libertad triunfa sobre la tiranía", ha afirmado. "¿Qué diremos si dejamos que un país democrático sea tomado por un dictador como (Vladimir) Putin?", ha manifestado. "¿Qué diría esto de nuestros valores y nuestra democracia?", ha sostenido. "No tiene por qué ser así. Tenemos recursos en Occidente y podemos usarlos si así lo deseamos. Así que el mensaje es simple: esto es un llamamiento al mundo para que despierte", ha aclarado. El jueves, el ministro británico confirmó la entrega de 10.000 nuevos drones a Ucrania, una decisión que convierte a Londres en el "mayor proveedor" de este tipo de artefactos al país. "Los drones están cambiando el curso de la guerra", dijo entonces antes de matizar que las autoridades han aumentado el presupuesto hasta los 325 millones de libras (380 millones de euros).

author: Zacks Investment Research
title: TSMC (TSM) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider - December 28, 2023 - Zacks.com
text:
TSMC ( TSM Quick Quote TSM - Free Report ) closed the most recent trading day at $104.70, moving +0.05% from the previous trading session. This change outpaced the S&P 500's 0.04% gain on the day. On the other hand, the Dow registered a gain of 0.14%, and the technology-centric Nasdaq decreased by 0.03%.
The chip company's shares have seen an increase of 5.84% over the last month, surpassing the Computer and Technology sector's gain of 4.9% and the S&P 500's gain of 5.28%.
The upcoming earnings release of TSMC will be of great interest to investors. The company's earnings per share (EPS) are projected to be $1.34, reflecting a 26.37% decrease from the same quarter last year. Our most recent consensus estimate is calling for quarterly revenue of $18.99 billion, down 4.71% from the year-ago period.
In terms of the entire fiscal year, the Zacks Consensus Estimates predict earnings of $4.97 per share and a revenue of $66.45 billion, indicating changes of -24.35% and -12.42%, respectively, from the former year.
Investors should also pay attention to any latest changes in analyst estimates for TSMC. These revisions help to show the ever-changing nature of near-term business trends. Consequently, upward revisions in estimates express analysts' positivity towards the company's business operations and its ability to generate profits.
Based on our research, we believe these estimate revisions are directly related to near-team stock moves. Investors can capitalize on this by using the Zacks Rank. This model considers these estimate changes and provides a simple, actionable rating system.
The Zacks Rank system ranges from #1 (Strong Buy) to #5 (Strong Sell). It has a remarkable, outside-audited track record of success, with #1 stocks delivering an average annual return of +25% since 1988. Over the past month, there's been no change in the Zacks Consensus EPS estimate. TSMC is currently sporting a Zacks Rank of #3 (Hold).
In the context of valuation, TSMC is at present trading with a Forward P/E ratio of 21.06. This valuation marks no noticeable deviation compared to its industry's average Forward P/E of 21.06.
Investors should also note that TSM has a PEG ratio of 2.94 right now. Comparable to the widely accepted P/E ratio, the PEG ratio also accounts for the company's projected earnings growth. The Semiconductor - Circuit Foundry industry currently had an average PEG ratio of 2.94 as of yesterday's close.
The Semiconductor - Circuit Foundry industry is part of the Computer and Technology sector. This industry, currently bearing a Zacks Industry Rank of 87, finds itself in the top 35% echelons of all 250+ industries.
The Zacks Industry Rank gauges the strength of our individual industry groups by measuring the average Zacks Rank of the individual stocks within the groups. Our research shows that the top 50% rated industries outperform the bottom half by a factor of 2 to 1.
Make sure to utilize Zacks.com to follow all of these stock-moving metrics, and more, in the coming trading sessions.

author: Kelly Fisher
title: Miranda Lambert Seeks To Help Dog Approaching His Anniversary In A Shelter | 94 Country WKKJ
text:
By Kelly Fisher Dec 26, 2024
Miranda Lambert and Ella Langley are seeking a home for a dog before his one-year anniversary in a shelter in Nashville, Tennessee.
Lambert shared a clip on social media earlier this week, capturing the MuttNation founder with Langley and others bonding with the dog, Butter , who is at Metro Animal Care and Control. Lambert’s video notes: “We need your help y’all! Butter has been in the shelter since January 24. Can we find him a home before his 1 year anniversary?!” Lambert added in her caption that Butter “is soooo sweet,” “catches yard moles,” and “is the goodest boy.” It was one of several posts Lambert shared from visits to local animal shelters with Langley, who is a founding board member of Tennessee-based rescue nonprofit Pawsitive Rescue Division.
Metro Nashville Animal Care and Control shared a post about Butter on Facebook , explaining that although Butter would spend Christmas with a family, he would return to the shelter on Thursday (December 26). Butter, 8, arrived at the shelter at the beginning of 2024 because his owner passed away. Per that post, Butter “loves to go on long walks, play fetch and even take dips in the pool. He is happy to meet lots of people and dogs on outings, especially because of all the pets he gets.” The post also notes that Butter walks well on a leash, is potty trained, loves being around people of all ages, rides well in the car and more. Find the full post about Butter here:

author: VNExplorer
title: Denise Maerker explota contra Marko Cortés y "Alito" Moreno tras Elecciones 2024: "no reconocen la realidad"
text: La reconocida periodista Denise Maerker lanzó duras críticas hacia los dirigentes del PAN y el PRI, Marko Cortés y Alejandro Moreno respectivamente, por su actitud ante la reciente derrota electoral. Maerker señaló que ambos líderes no han dado la cara ni reconocido la contundente realidad de los resultados electorales. Denise Maerker en Tercer Grado Deportivo. FOTO: ESPECIAL Denise Maerker explota contra Marko Cortés y "Alito" Moreno En su participación en el programa de análisis político "Tercer Grado", transmitido por N+ y que de igual manera se está viralizando por la red social X, Denise Maerker expresó su sorpresa ante la falta de gallardía de Cortés y Moreno luego de su abrumadora derrota en las elecciones. La periodista cuestionó la ausencia de los líderes partidistas frente a sus seguidores y su reticencia a aceptar la contundencia de los resultados. Maerker recordó un encuentro previo con Xóchitl Gálvez, candidata presidencial, en el que mencionó la influencia detrás de ella de Cortés y Moreno, inscritos en la lista de sus partidos al Senado como plurinominales, asegurando sus futuros cargos políticos. La comunicadora también lamentó la falta de una respuesta adecuada por parte de las dirigencias panistas y priistas ante las denuncias de fraude electoral, considerando su desempeño como "patético" y carente de una narrativa convincente para la ciudadanía. ¿Por qué ganó Morena? Denise Maerker lo explica En otro momento del programa, Denise Maerker analizó los motivos detrás del voto ciudadano a favor de Morena, señalando la falta de comprensión por parte de la oposición. La periodista destacó la importancia de los programas sociales implementados por el gobierno actual y su impacto positivo en la vida de los ciudadanos. Maerker argumentó que los votantes son plenamente racionales al respaldar a un partido que ha generado cambios tangibles en su calidad de vida. Criticó la idea de pedirles que defiendan un sistema abstracto que no les ha brindado beneficios concretos, haciendo hincapié en la relevancia de las políticas sociales en la toma de decisiones electorales. "No puedes pedirles a las personas que salgan a votar y todavía cuestionar su racionalidad, son plenamente racionales, están votando por algo que es importantísimo para ellos, mañana, pasado, a fin de mes". finalizó la periodista. También te interesará: "La Emperatriz" 2816: ¿Quién era Dulce, mujer que perdió la vida al ser golpeada por la locomotora en Hidalgo? їQuГ© son los вЂњazulitosвЂќ y por quГ© el ISSSTE emitiГі una alerta por consumirlos? La conocida fruta que puedes comer a toda hora y mejora la salud de tus riñones como así también te recupera tras el ejercicio Únete a nuestro canal ¡EL UNIVERSAL ya está en Whatsapp!, desde tu dispositivo móvil entérate de las noticias más relevantes del día, artículos de opinión, entretenimiento, tendencias y más.

author: @getmyuniedu
title: Top NITs Accepting Admission with 7000 rank in NIMCET 2025 - Getmyuni
text:
According to the previous year trends, the list of NITs for 7000 rank in NIMCET 2025 include NIT Agartala, NIT Raipur, and NIT Patna. The final allocation will be done during the NIMCET counselling 2025.
The list of NITs for 7000 rank in NIMCET 2025 comprises NIT Meghalaya, NIT Patna, NIT Agartala, and others, where there is less demand for MCA programs. The final seat allocation will be done based on the
NIMCET 2025 cutoff, which will be released during the counselling process.
NIMCET is the national-level exam for admission to
MCA programs at participating NITs. Thus, candidates willing to gain admission to any of the institutes with a 7000 rank in NIMCET must keep a check on the probable list.
In practice, a rank as high as 7000 is not considered strong – even mid-tier NITs often have closing ranks in the low hundreds. In general, a 7000 rank would only secure admission under certain reserved categories (SC/ST) at NITs with very high cutoffs. The following sections list the NITs that historically had very high closing ranks (often via reserved seats), explain key factors, and outline the admission process.
NITs for 7000 Rank in NIMCET 2025 for MCA Admission
Very few NITs fill seats around rank 7000 through
NIMCET 2025. In the last few years, only reserved-category seats at certain NITs closed that high. For example, in NIMCET 2024, the ST cutoff at NIT Patna was about 7771-7956, and at NITK Surathkal (ST) it was around 4654. By contrast, open-category cutoffs at Allahabad and Surathkal were only ~180 and ~114. The table below lists some NITs that typically have the highest closing ranks (often via SC/ST seats), along with their approximate closing rank range and average MCA tuition fee:

Each closing-rank range above is an estimate based on previous years’ cutoffs. For instance, NIT Patna’s MCA ST seats closed near 7956, while Allahabad’s ST was ~4893. General-category seats at these NITs have much lower cutoffs (e.g. Allahabad ~180), so a 7000 rank in the General category would not be enough. The fees are typical annual tuition; actual fees may vary by institute.
Is 7000 Rank in NIMCET 2025 Good?
A rank of 7000 in NIMCET is generally not good – it falls into the “Poor” performance zone. Candidates with a rank in the 6001–10000 range are usually admitted only in very limited cases (often via ST/SC quotas). Below is a general grade chart showing the
NIMCET marks vs rank analysis 2025:

NIMCET Closing Ranks 2025(Expected)
The closing ranks for admission of candidates, as allocated, most likely followed a similar pattern throughout all ten participating NITs. It is important to remember that to secure a position at each NIT, you must pay attention to the previously mentioned anticipated NIMCET Cut Off 2025. The official closing ranks for each institute are listed in the table below, which candidates can use to determine their category-wise ranking:
|NIT||OPEN||OBC-NCL||SC||ST|
|NIT Trichy||40||100||450||1100|
|NIT Warangal||90||210||520||1300|
|NIT Surathkal||180||320||750||1700|
|NIT Allahabad||220||400||900||2000|
|NIT Calicut||265||500||1000||2400|
|NIT Bhopal||320||560||1200||2600|
|NIT Jamshedpur||525||780||1800||3600|
|NIT Durgapur||470||720||1600||3300|
|NIT Kurukshetra||545||800||2000||3900|
|NIT Raipur||649||860||2400||4200|
|NIT Patna||670||900||4200||7900|
|NIT Agartala||690||950||4500||8200|
How to Verify the NIMCET Cutoff 2025?
The NIMCET Cut Off 2025 is anticipated to be made public on the organisation's official website, where all applicants can access it. Candidates can use these steps to view the cut-off marks:
-
Firstly, go to the organisation's official website.
-
Locate the notification link for the NIMCET Cut Off 2025 marks on the homepage.
-
In step three, click that link. The screen will display the cutoff marks.
-
Download the cut-off PDF file according to its screen display and print it out as needed.
A 7000 rank falls in the “Poor” band. In practical terms, except for SC/ST candidates (who have their own cutoffs), a 7000 rank in the general category would not secure admission in any NIT. Even for SC/ST, only the very highest close (like NIT Patna’s ST close ~7956) allows anything near rank 7000. All other ST/SC cutoffs were much lower (e.g. Surathkal ST ~4654).
List of NITs Based on NIMCET 2025 Ranks

author: Jarrett Johnson, Daily Comet
title: UPDATE: Due to weather the Texas A&M softball quarterfinals game has been moved
text:
UPDATE: Due to weather the Texas A&M softball quarterfinals game has been moved Jarrett Johnson | Staff Writer Texas A&M (39-12, 15-9 SEC) will have to wait one more day before they can take the diamond in the quarterfinal round of the 2024 SEC softball tournament. Rain has interrupted the flow of the tournament and the Aggie's Thursday game against South Carolina will not take place on Friday.
The Aggies earned a first-round bye after earning the No.3 Seed and found out their opponent after South Carolina beat Mississippi State to advance to the next round. With the delay, the teams will now face off on Friday, May 10, 35 minutes after game one is complete. You can check out the full schedule update below.
https://twitter.com/SEC/status/1788630873929077242
Texas A&M needs this win to regain some confidence and momentum after being swept to close the season. I have no doubt Coach Trisha Ford will have them ready to battle.
Contact/Follow us @AggiesWire on Twitter, and like our page on Facebook to follow ongoing coverage of Texas A&M news, notes, and opinions. Follow Jarrett Johnson on Twitter: @whosnextsports1 .

author: Ana Carolina Carvalho
title: Campeão olímpico de BMX é assaltado antes dos Jogos em Paris
text:
Campeão olímpico de BMX é assaltado antes dos Jogos em Paris Os itens do assalto foram recuperados em uma praça próxima graças a um chip de geolocalização
25/julho/2024 por Ana Carolina Carvalho Compartilhe Logan Martin, compartilhou um registro do incidente nas redes sociais e comentou: “Que início de viagem louco” – Foto: Instagram @loganmartinbmx Assaltaram os atletas de BMX da Austrália na van onde guardam seus materiais em Bruxelas, na Bélgica, antes de seguirem para os jogos nas Olimpíadas de Paris , na França. Na quarta-feira (24), ladrões quebraram os vidros do veículo e roubaram roupas e itens pessoais
Ainda assim, Logan Martin, medalhista de ouro na última edição dos Jogos, compartilhou um registro de que foi assaltado nas redes sociais e comentou: “Que início de viagem louco”.
De acordo com O Globo , os ladrões levaram do veículo mochilas, carteiras e a mesa de massagem do fisioterapeuta da equipe. Felizmente, um chip de geolocalização permitiu que eles recuperassem os itens em uma praça próxima ao local do furto.
Além disso, durante um vídeo, um colega de equipe fez uma piada, dizendo que os ladrões haviam comido os chocolates que estavam nas bolsas.
“Felizmente, a maioria das nossas coisas estavam no nosso quarto e conseguimos recuperar muitas. Perdi a minha carteira, mochila e algumas outras coisas, mas, no geral, não acabou por ser péssimo”, escreveu o campeão na legenda.
Veja abaixo o vídeo gravado pelo atleta que sofreu o assalto antes dos jogos em Paris
Ver essa foto no Instagram
Uma publicação compartilhada por Logan Martin OAM (@loganmartinbmx)
tags 2024 Austrália BMX Copa dos Campeões esporte olímpico jogos eletronicos Olimpíadas de Paris Paris

author: Siladitya Ray
title: Trabajadores de Boeing votan a favor de ir a la huelga y rechazan oferta de aumento salarial
text:
Miles de trabajadores sindicalizados de las fábricas de Boeing votaron a favor de hacer huelga el jueves por la noche, lo que supone un duro golpe para el fabricante de aviones que ya se enfrenta a un intenso escrutinio sobre la seguridad de sus aviones.
Datos clave
Los distritos 751 y W24 del sindicato Asociación Internacional de Maquinistas y Trabajadores Aeroespaciales (IAM), que representa a alrededor de 33.000 trabajadores de la fábrica de Boeing,
anunciaron que sus miembros votaron el 94,6% para rechazar la oferta de contrato de la compañía y el 96% a favor de una huelga.
El sindicato dijo que la huelga comenzará a la medianoche (hora del Pacífico).
Los trabajadores
rechazaron un acuerdo tentativo de la empresa que ofrecía aumentos del 25% durante cuatro años y menores costos de atención médica.
Después de anunciar el resultado de la votación sindical, el presidente del Distrito 751 de la IAM, Jon Holden,
dijo : “Se trata de respeto, se trata del pasado y se trata de luchar por nuestro futuro”.
Holden, quien previamente había instado a los trabajadores a aceptar
la oferta de Boeing , dijo que el liderazgo del sindicato está preparado para volver a la mesa de negociaciones con la empresa y “tratar de resolver los problemas y abordar las necesidades de los miembros”.
Forbes se puso en contacto con Boeing para solicitarle comentarios.
Cita crucial
La IAM
https://www.goiam.org/news/iam-union-fully-supports-district-751-and-w24-members-after-rejecting-boeing-contract/ sobre la decisión de los trabajadores de la fábrica de Boeing: “Los miembros de la IAM de toda América del Norte se solidarizan con nuestros miembros en el noroeste del Pacífico y California. Nuestro objetivo es lograr un contrato sólido que satisfaga las necesidades de nuestros miembros”.
Antecedentes clave
Boeing y el sindicato habían llegado a un acuerdo provisional durante el fin de semana para evitar una huelga. Aparte del aumento salarial ofrecido, la empresa también prometió construir su próximo avión nuevo en su fábrica en el área de Puget Sound, en el estado de Washington. En un
comunicado , Stephanie Pope, jefa de la división de aviones comerciales de Boeing, calificó el contrato de “histórico” y dijo que prevé “el mayor aumento salarial general de la historia, una menor participación en los costos médicos para que la atención médica sea más asequible, mayores contribuciones de la empresa para la jubilación y mejoras para un mejor equilibrio entre el trabajo y la vida personal”. El lunes, Holden recomendó a los miembros del sindicato que aceptaran el acuerdo, diciendo que los negociadores “no pueden garantizar que podamos lograr más en una huelga”. Sin embargo, el presidente del sindicato reconoció al Seattle Times que era probable que se produjera una huelga porque: “La respuesta de la gente es que no es lo suficientemente buena”.
Tangente
La huelga se produce en un momento en que Boeing se enfrenta a un mayor escrutinio sobre la seguridad de sus aviones de pasajeros y otras crisis, incluidos los problemas con su nave espacial Starliner. Los aviones 737 MAX de Boeing estuvieron involucrados en dos accidentes fatales en 2018 y 2019, lo que provocó su inmovilización durante más de un año y medio. A principios de este año, la seguridad del 737 MAX volvió a ser el centro de atención después de que un tapón de la puerta explotara en un vuelo de Alaskan Airlines minutos después del despegue.
En julio, Boeing acordó declararse culpable de un cargo de conspiración de fraude en un acuerdo con el Departamento de Justicia en un caso federal vinculado a los dos accidentes del 737 Max. La compañía todavía enfrenta una
investigación criminal separada por el incidente de Alaska Airlines. La primera nave espacial de la compañía, el Starliner, también tuvo problemas en su primera misión tripulada el mes pasado. Después de llevar a los astronautas de la NASA Sunita Williams y Barry “Butch” Wilmore a la Estación Espacial Internacional, el Starliner se vio obligado a regresar a la Tierra sin ellos debido a preocupaciones de seguridad . Este artículo fue publicado originalmente por Forbes US.

¿Amazon está intentando comprar TikTok? Los vínculos entre las dos empresas se profundizan

author: The Business Research Company
title: Unlocking Opportunities in the Solar Water Heaters Market:
text:
Unlocking Opportunities in the Solar Water Heaters Market: 2025-2034 Forecast Report 07-31-2025 06:29 AM CET | IT, New Media & Software
Press release from: The Business Research Company Solar Water Heaters Market
Use code ONLINE30 to get 30% off on global market reports and stay ahead of tariff changes, macro trends, and global economic shifts
What Will the Solar Water Heaters Industry Market Size Be by 2025?
In recent times, there has been substantial growth in the market size of solar water heaters. It is projected to increase from $4.63 billion in 2024 to $5.03 billion in 2025, exhibiting a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 8.6%. The considerable growth witnessed in the past is the result of the surge in energy costs and unstable fossil fuel markets, heightened emphasis on energy independence and security, along with an increasing inclination of consumers towards sustainable and environmentally friendly solutions.
What's the Long-Term Growth Forecast for the Solar Water Heaters Market Size Through 2029?
In the forthcoming years, the market for solar water heaters is forecasted to experience substantial growth. It is projected to rise to $6.61 billion in 2029, with a compound annual growth rate of 7.0%. This growth during the forecast period can be credited to high demand for off-grid and decentralized energy solutions, the increasing acceptance of hybrid solar water heating systems, and the continuation of government incentives and policies favoring renewable energy. Predictive analytics and artificial intelligence for system optimization, the emergence of new business models centered on energy-as-a-service and performance contracting, the establishment of standards and certifications to maintain product quality and safety, and cooperative partnerships between manufacturers and utilities aimed at promoting solar water heating are the leading trends to watch for during the forecast period.
View the full report here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/report/solar-water-heaters-global-market-report
What Are the Key Growth Drivers Fueling the Solar Water Heaters Market Expansion?
The surge in energy costs is predicted to drive the expansion of the solar water heater market in the future. Energy, the foundational element of nature, is transferred among different parts of a system, facilitating the creation of usable power like heat or electricity. The burgeoning prices can be attributed to escalating demand, supply restrictions, global political conflicts, and the shift towards green energy alternatives. Solar water heaters have a crucial part to play in offsetting the effects of soaring energy costs as they offer an economical and eco-friendly solution for heating water. For example, in the first half of 2024, Eurostat, a government agency located in Luxembourg, stated that domestic electricity prices in the EU witnessed the most significant hike in Ireland, surging by 37% when compared to the similar timeframe in 2023. Consequently, the intensifying energy costs are fueling the growth of the solar water heater market.
Get your free sample here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/sample.aspx?id=14208&type=smp
What Are the Key Trends Driving Solar Water Heaters Market Growth?
Leading firms within the solar water heater market are shifting their emphasis towards the innovation of new products such as Eco Cute, with an aim to improve their financial standing in the market. The Eco Cute system, incorporating an air-source heat pump system and a hot water storage unit, effortlessly combines with residential solar panels to utilize surplus solar energy for water heating. For example, in March 2022, the Eco Cute system was launched by Panasonic Corporation, an electronics company based in Japan. The system derives heat from the air to generate heated water for home use. It presents an eco-friendly method of heating water by employing supercritical carbon dioxide as a refrigerant, as opposed to traditional gases like ammonia or haloalkanes. The Eco Cute system is praised for its environmentally friendly benefits such as energy conservation and the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions. This system includes a heat pump and a hot water storage unit that helps keep bath water temperatures stable, which in turn saves energy and minimises water use.
How Is the Solar Water Heaters Market Segmented?
The solar water heaters market covered in this report is segmented -
1) By System: Thermosiphon, Pumped
2) By Collector: Evacuated Tube Collector, Flat Plate Collector, Unglazed Water Collector
3) By Capacity: 100 L, 150 Liter, 200 Liter, Other Capacity
4) By Application: Residential, Commercial, Industrial
Subsegments:
1) By Thermosiphon: Direct Thermosiphon Systems, Indirect Thermosiphon Systems
2) By Pumped: Active Pumped Systems, Passive Pumped Systems

Major companies operating in the solar water heaters market are Robert Bosch GmbH, Hubbell Incorporated, Viessmann Manufacturing, Ariston Group, Rheem Manufacturing Company, Stiebel Eltron Inc., Tata Power Solar Systems Limited, V-Guard Industries Ltd., Bradford White Corporation, Himin Solar Energy Group, Photon Energy Systems Ltd., A. O. Smith, Central Electronics Limited, Alternate Energy Technologies LLC, Kodsan Isı Teknolojileri, SunEarth Inc., Apricus Solar Co. Ltd., Jupiter Solar Power Limited, SunTank, Solav Energy, Ferroli S.p.A., FAFCO Inc., Wagner & Co Solartechnik GmbH, Chemtrols Solar Pvt. Ltd., Nihon Itomic Co. Ltd.
Which Regions Are Leading the Global Solar Water Heaters Market in Revenue?
North America was the largest region in the solar water heaters market in 2024. Asia-Pacific is expected to be the fastest-growing region in the forecast period. The regions covered in the solar water heaters market report are Asia-Pacific, Western Europe, Eastern Europe, North America, South America, Middle East, Africa.

title: Metalmeccanici scioperano in Piazza a Frosinone
text:
Metalmeccanici scioperano in Piazza a Frosinone
Oggi, venerdì 28 marzo 2025, è la giornata dello sciopero dei Metalmeccanici proclamato dai sindacati Fim, Fiom e Uilm. I lavoratori incrociano le braccia per otto ore in tutta Italia, Frosinone compresa, dove è in corso una manifestazione. I motivi della ManifestazioneGli operai si sono.Leggi su Frosinonetoday.it
Frosinonetoday.it - Metalmeccanici scioperano in Piazza a Frosinone
- Metalmeccanici scioperano in Piazza a Frosinone
- Metalmeccanici, proclamato uno sciopero con manifestazione: i dettagli
- Rinnovo del contratto bloccato, a Genova sciopero e corteo dei metalmeccanici
- Oggi lo sciopero dei metalmeccanici in sciopero, sindacati in piazza per il contratto
- A Firenze e in Sardegna sciopero dei metalmeccanici per il contratto. In attesa del 28 marzo
- Sciopero metalmeccanici, in migliaia stamani in piazza a Firenze – ASCOLTA
Ne parlano su altre fonti
- Metalmeccanici in sciopero per 8 ore per il rinnovo del contratto. Sindacati in piazza a Napoli - Il segretario generale Uilm Rocco Palombella: "Andremo avanti nella lotta fino a che non verranno accolte le nostre istanze, non ci fermeremo" ... (rainews.it)
- Metalmeccanici in piazza a Roma, in corteo verso il Mimit - Diverse centinaia di lavoratori metalmeccanici della provincia di Roma, insieme alle organizzazioni sindacali, si sono radunati a piazza Barberini, nella Capitale, in occasione dello sciopero nazional ... (msn.com)
- Sciopero metalmeccanici del 25 marzo: migliaia di lavoratori in piazza - I lavoratori del settore metalmeccanico stanno manifestando in molte città italiane per chiedere il rinnovo del contratto di lavoro. In una nota congiunta di Fim, Fiom, e Uilm, i sindacati spiegano ch ... (msn.com)
